info.name: Trello Ansel
info.description: A Trello theme inspired by Ansel Adams. Trello Ansel makes use of a largely monochrome color palate and uses slightly reduced margins, padding, and typeface sizes. Translucence is used sparingly for a fresh feel, but the styling remains mostly flat and modern. Trello Ansel themes even the details, including labels, progress bars, user badges and buttons.
info.additionalInfo: If you'd like to change the background image, simply adjust the URL on line 9. This only themes boards, no other pages on Trello are affected. Based on Trello Clear by angelo.
